column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/3fc684618195518d472bb8365339b9ef66d61815 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
Well, since the files have now been updated in 2014, shouldn't the year at least be extend to 2014 in the license comments?\n
No. Only the header has been added in 2014, that is not a copyright-worthy change in itself. BTW why the hell are you even wasting time discussing this.\n
